argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | fsumlt.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) |
| 2 |  | fsumlt.2 | |- ( ph -> A =/= (/) ) |
| 3 |  | fsumlt.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. RR ) |
| 4 |  | fsumlt.4 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> C e. RR ) |
| 5 |  | fsumlt.5 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B < C ) |
| 6 |  | #P_difrp | |- ( ( B e. RR /\ C e. RR ) -> ( B < C <-> ( C - B ) e. RR+ ) ) |
| 7 | 3, 4, 6 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> ( B < C <-> ( C - B ) e. RR+ ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> ( C - B ) e. RR+ ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 8 | #P_fsumrpcl | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A ( C - B ) e. RR+ ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_rpgt0d | |- ( ph -> 0 < sum_ k e. A ( C - B ) ) |
| 11 | 4 | #P_recnd | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> C e. CC ) |
| 12 | 3 | #P_recnd | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 13 | 1, 11, 12 | #P_fsumsub | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A ( C - B ) = ( sum_ k e. A C - sum_ k e. A B ) ) |
| 14 | 10, 13 | #P_breqtrd | |- ( ph -> 0 < ( sum_ k e. A C - sum_ k e. A B ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 3 | #P_fsumrecl | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A B e. RR ) |
| 16 | 1, 4 | #P_fsumrecl | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A C e. RR ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_posdifd | |- ( ph -> ( sum_ k e. A B < sum_ k e. A C <-> 0 < ( sum_ k e. A C - sum_ k e. A B ) ) ) |
| 18 | 14, 17 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A B < sum_ k e. A C ) |
